channel.title: Project Railway
channel.description:
"What is project railway?" Its an attempt (Thought up my yours truly) to connect different big settlements of minecraft, and other settlements for quick transportation.
"Inb4 Nether hurrrr" Yes, the nether, but having the chance of burning up, and having the chance of burning up, shot by a ghast, falling in lava... this is much safer.
"Nty i dont want random ppl coming into my house through a railway and griefing/stealing my stuff." Well, only certain people verified will be able to use the railway, meaning you can only walk in the area of the station if i allow it.
"Hmm.. I'm convinced.. how do i join the system?" Well first, you need to be a trusted member (In my eyes), and show commitment to help protect the railway that connects your house to the station. You must be within a 1000 block radius of the train station to be connected, if not, you can work things out with me, by supplying rails of your own.If you are connected, you will also automatically have access to the entire railway system.
"Well.. do i need to connect to have access to the system?" No, but you would just need to pay a small, one time fee and try to keep the same duties as any other railway owner (Letting me or a mod know that the railway is griefed, report it, etc.)
Terms and Rules: If you break any of these rules, you will not be able to use the railway anymore, and i will destroy the railway connecting you, and the railway system, and if you are just a user, you will NOT get your entrance fee back. 1. Do not grief/steal any of the rails in the system. 2. Not really a rule, but just don't use it to raid.... 3. If you are a railway owner, report any stolen rails/sabotaging of rails immediately. 4. I have all rights to strip off the railway for ANY rails for a given reason.
Payment options: If you don't want the railway to be linked to your house, but want access to it, here are the fees: Either: 1 diamond or.. 6 gold ingots/gold (enough to make 6 more powered rails) 6 iron ingots/iron (enough to make 16 rails)
Current map of the railways: (Thanks to matty :)) [img]http://i.imgur.com/tiE52.jpg[/img] [size=36pt][b]Current Railways:[/b][/size] To Falador To Batzilla's place. To Nether Railway To Spawn City To Herobrines To Broville To Celladors To KaniBasamis more coming.
Currently Building:
On Que: Nether Railway
[size=36pt]Current NETHER Railways[/size] Still need to start on this.
On que for nether railway:
Agl/Reyx's place. saitofoxs place (mironic)
[b][size=24pt]CURRENT PROBLEMS[/size][/b] Well, i tried to make an nether portal so i can start on the nether railway, but i just end up at the spawn portal.. do you need to be out of a certain radius to have ur own nether portal?
[b][size=18pt]Railway is currently[/size][/b] [size=24pt]Offline, still in construction.[/size]
[size=14pt]Current ownage people helping us :)[/size] Magma828(Redstone, certain tunnels, etc.) Killerlawl (Building first railway to spawn city) Herobrine (Laying rails for tracks)

Is that where our iron went?[/quote]

well yea i made a new base though so im gonna go cave exploring soon so we gonna get it back

item.title: Project Railway
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:26, topic:404239”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=501299.msg3688352#msg3688352 date=1311975010]
Well, im back! And from what it looks like from the poll, you will need your house connected to use the railroad.
[/quote]
In case you don’t know, killerlawl made a track from his house (in spawn station) to your station a while ago. Since then we’ve made it into an actual stop. You should come and take a look

I think it would be a good idea if the cart coming from spawn to your station would stop next to a set of buttons, where players can select whether they just want to get off or continue directly to one of the other stops (ie, falador or bazilla’s place). I could do this, but I need +build in your station.

So far there are no redundant routes, and my rails go in the opposite direction to yours.[/quote]
yep, i saw it yesterday, but sure, ill give you building permission :).
But just to let you know now, its nothing fancy, its a simple straight up railroad, something an idiot much like myself cant mess up.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Railway
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

drubrkletern:

Well, im back! And from what it looks like from the poll, you will need your house connected to use the railroad.

In case you don’t know, killerlawl made a track from his house (in spawn station) to your station a while ago. Since then we’ve made it into an actual stop. You should come and take a look

I think it would be a good idea if the cart coming from spawn to your station would stop next to a set of buttons, where players can select whether they just want to get off or continue directly to one of the other stops (ie, falador or bazilla’s place). I could do this, but I need +build in your station.

So far there are no redundant routes, and my rails go in the opposite direction to yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Railway
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

xx matty xx:

I’ve been thinking of doing something with the spawn city area, because the concept of a large public city has been messed up by residence. It has 3 flat 64x64 areas, so maybe it could be used for a massive spawn train station? Each rail could be protected by a door that requires a button combination to be pressed, which I could make.

I’d be willing to make a track there, and then from there I could finally make a track to my home.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Yes, but I don’t allow anyone to set the move or use flag, they are always set to true.

then in that case, doorways leading in and out of rail tunnels will be placed.

EDIT

Started building a railway to falador.

item.title: Project Railway
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Moparisthebest:

But movement can’t be disabled on residences, can it? It shouldn’t be able to be disabled. Of course you can restrict access with walls and doors and such. (pistons soon)

well, then i can create doors in front of tunnels to use the railways, and make a subzone to use the move flag.

Defines whether said player/group can move inside the protected area. If set to false, the player/group will not be able to enter.

Straight from the residencebukkitmod wiki.

Of course you can restrict access with walls and doors and such.
Yeah, i think the "use" flag can be used to do that to, once i find out how to use subzones... ill try and get both of those flags to work correctly... or just use them in my whole residence.

Read full topic
